name: OutFoxed
description:
You are a clever burglar. Go rob a rich duck!

[WASD] or [ARROW KEYS] to move!
Hold [SPACE] to steal!
Hold [SPACE] and move to run! While running, you can break windows.

Presented by SuperTry Studios

Character Concepts and Art by Jeff Pennington

Duck Noises by Sam Linstrom

Funk by Joe Kenneally

Game by Kevin Cole

This game exists because of our cool patrons.

Very Big Thanks to:

This is the 4th of 12 games I'm making this year. If you want to support my madness check out my Patreon.
